name: Ashish
title: Full Stack Developer
summary: Motivated and detail-oriented Computer Science student with hands-on experience in full-stack development, mobile apps, and cross-platform solutions. Proficient in Java, Flutter, and Spring Boot with a keen eye for UI/UX design and scalable architecture. Strong background in version control systems like GitHub and a solid understanding of data structures, algorithms, and software development methodologies. Seeking opportunities in software engineering and mobile development.

projects.name: Student Management System
bullets: Built a full-stack web application with a modern UI using HTML and Spring Boot, leading to efficient student record management.
Engineered the backend with Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, and JPA, handling data storage for over 100 student records during testing.
Leveraged SQL (MySQL) for database management, reducing query latency by optimizing indexing.
Structured the MVC architecture with clean and aligned sections across pages to ensure consistency for better scalability.
Features include adding, updating, and deleting student records through a user-friendly multi-page interface.

projects.name: Real-Time Chat App
bullets: Created and implemented a real-time chat app using Flutter, achieving message synchronization under 200 ms between two users.
Integrated Firebase Authentication for account creation and login, supporting up to 50 test users.
Incorporated image sharing with compression to maintain performance.
Features responsive UI, fast scrolling, and smooth page transitions.

projects.name: File Recovery Software
bullets: Developed a Windows desktop app frontend in Flutter with an intuitive UI.
Integrated native C++ via FFI to fetch disk insights like size, available space, and used space with millisecond response times.
Application optimized for consistent performance under varying system loads.
Planning future iterations to support selective file recovery for NTFS and FAT partitions.

projects.name: Movie Search Android App
bullets: Developed an Android app using Flutter, providing access to OMDB API data for over 500,000 movies.
Displays comprehensive information such as description, cast, release date, upcoming releases, and IMDb ratings.
Achieved app startup time under 2 seconds with optimized API handling.
Implemented search filters and pagination to improve data accessibility.

skills: Technologies: Firebase, UI/UX Design, Cross-Platform Development, Mobile Development, Version Control, GitHub, Data Structures, Algorithms
Tools: Git, GitHub, VS Code, Android Studio
